scripts.build: pnpm --cwd frontend install && pnpm --cwd frontend build
scripts.dev: export COMMIT_HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && pnpm build && pnpm database:migrate --local && pnpm pages dev frontend/dist --d1 DATABASE --persist --compatibility-date=2022-12-20 --binding 'INSTANCE_TITLE=Test 1212' 'INSTANCE_DESCR=My 1212 Instance' 'ACCESS_AUTH_DOMAIN=0.0.0.0.cloudflareaccess.com' 'ACCESS_AUD=DEV_AUD' 'ADMIN_EMAIL=kraig@test.email'  --live-reload
scripts.ci-dev-test-ui: pnpm build && pnpm database:create-mock && pnpm pages dev frontend/dist --d1 DATABASE --persist --port 8788  --binding 'INSTANCE_TITLE=Test 1212' 'INSTANCE_DESCR=My 1212 Instance' 'ACCESS_AUTH_DOMAIN=0.0.0.0.cloudflareaccess.com' 'ACCESS_AUD=DEV_AUD' 'ADMIN_EMAIL=kraig@test.email' --compatibility-date=2022-12-20
scripts.deploy:init: pnpm pages project create sixteen && pnpm d1 create sixteen
scripts.deploy: pnpm build && pnpm database:migrate && pnpm pages publish frontend/dist --project-name=sixteen
